name: Pathology testing
description: Pathology tests cover blood tests, and tests on urine, stools (faeces) and bodily tissues.

name: Advanced microscopy
description: Advanced microscopy techniques such as SEM, TEM and Dual Beam SEM are essential techniques to investigate sample microstructure, particle coatings and defects

name: Chemical research
description: Many chemicals used by the health sector are employed for specific purposes unique to health care, for instance or disinfectants for sterilization.
